title: High ping
body: in league i only get around 50-60ms but for the past 2 days now my ping will start a 70ms when i leave spawn it  stays at 150+ for the rest of the match. i checked my other games such as  Dead by daylight pubg csgo R6 etc... but my ping is fine in them  anyone know what to do or is it on my end??

replies.body:
It doesn't seem like all of NA is being impacted by ping issues, so this might be something more related to how your connection is being routed to our game servers. Do me a favor and update your DNS settings to 8.8.8.8/8.8.4.4 really quickly and test it in a custom game. 

If that doesn't seem to help at first, run a traceroute for me so I can get a clear picture of how your connection looks to see what might be happening. You can use [WinMTR](http://winmtr.net/winmtr-v0-92-now-available/) to run a trace to 104.160.131.1 and post the results here so I can see. Make sure you let that trace run for at least 5-10 min to get some good data.
Yeah last couple of days my ping went up by 20ish. It's normally around 40 and now its 60-70. ISP is Comcast.

You're not the only one who has been having this problem. Every since the new Patch (8.2) my ping won't stay down. I truly believe this has something to do with Riot and the new update so hopefully they can fix this soon.
